name: Regal Fabric
description: A special piece of cloth which could be used to make empire banners to show off your empire's colors. Once purchased, this will go into your vault where it can be withdrawn to build the banners. Banners require either 1 or 2 cloth depending on the banner and you can check the recipes for these in the compendium.

name: Pumpkin the Qitt Pet
description: This limited item will be available for purchase until November 6th
